alethinophidia.game

Class GamePlayGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • alethinophidia.game.GamePlayGenerator

  • public class GamePlayGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Main game play manager, that creates and controls game play elements such as SnakeCareCenter, ItemFactory, MapGrid and CollisionSolver. also holds ongoing game info: used theme name, game mode, actual level Every time new game starts, GamePlayGenerator is recreated.
    Author:
    £ukasz Piotrowski
